TEI.2.document_title: Stephen F Austin to Jose Antonio Mexia, 07-09-1832

barker_notes.barker_summary: Austin to José Antonio Mexia, Matamoros, July 9, 1832. Will accompany Mexia to Texas. Convinced that the colonists have no designs on the integrity of Mexican territory, but that they are resisting unconstitutional acts of the military.

*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin to José Antonio Mexia, Matamoros, July 9, 1832. Will accompany Mexia to Texas. Convinced that the colonists have no designs on the integrity of Mexican territory, but that they are resisting unconstitutional acts of the military.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p*I have received your communication of the*date_mentioned n="07-08-1832"> 8th inst*/date_mentioned*. accompanying a letter of *person_mentioned*Colonel Guerra*/person_mentioned* of the *date_mentioned n="07-07-1832">7th */date_mentioned*also a copy of the articles of agreement, entered into between that *person_mentioned*officer */person_mentioned*and yourself on the *date_mentioned n="07-06-1832">6th*/date_mentioned*.*/p*
*p*You are pleased to say to me in your communication that you and *person_mentioned*Colonel Guerra*/person_mentioned* agree that I ought to accompany you in your *person_mentioned*expedition */person_mentioned*to *location_mentioned*Texas*/location_mentioned*, in order to contribute by my influence in the *location_mentioned*colonies*/location_mentioned* to calm the passions of the *person_mentioned*people */person_mentioned*unhappily aroused there, In answer, I have the honor to say that I am ready to accompany you and anxious to contribute with all my power to the service of my *location_mentioned*adopted Country*/location_mentioned*. At the same time I would observe that I am convinced that the *person_mentioned*Colonists of *location_mentioned*Texas*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned* have no views opposed to the integrity of the *person_mentioned*Mexican Government*/person_mentioned*. The disturbances there were in consequence of the arbitrary conduct of the *person_mentioned*Officers of the General Government*/person_mentioned* and excesses committed against the Constitution and rights of the *location_mentioned*State of Coahuila and Texas*/location_mentioned*, and had no other cause, How ever I believe that my presence in *location_mentioned*Texas */location_mentioned*is necessary to calm the irritation and to restore harmony.*/p*
*p*I avail myself of this occasion to present to you the assurances of my respect and consideration*/p*
*p*God and Liberty*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Stephen F. Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**location_mentioned*Matamoras */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="07-09-1832">July 9th 1832*/date_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
